value:
$WmMPID_比翼ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_FM_Pair,Face|Hi, Sothe!$k$p$nMPID_サザ|You're in high spirits, Micaiah.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|I am! I feel full of life today. Let's
attribute it to these lovely clothes.$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Don't give them too much credit.
They've mostly made me feel weird.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|Try to relax. We deserve to enjoy
ourselves once in a while, don't we?$k$pLook—everyone's pairing off. See the
way the colors swirl together as they
dance? Isn't it eye-catching?$k$pCome on. Let's join them.$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Micaiah, I don't think I can...
I mean those people are...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|Hm? They're what?$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Never mind. Let's go.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|Oh, Sothe... Always keeping secrets.$k$p

$WmMPID_比翼ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_FM_Pair,Face|Phew... Enough dancing for now.
Let's take a break, shall we?$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Thought you'd never ask.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|Quite the festival, isn't it? It's been
very popular with the couples.$k$pI wonder how many are married.
They all look so happy—like they're
ready to spend their lives together...$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Yeah. They're nauseating.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|What?! Why?$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Because, they... Look, they make me
think about how unlike them we are.$k$pAll I can think about is how, even
though we're together now, we
will inevitably be separated again.$k$pThe thought turns my stomach.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|Sothe... I'm thinking about it too.
I'm jealous of these couples who
have so much time on their hands.$k$pBut the happiness we share now,
dancing hand in hand... For the time
being, at least, it's the same as theirs.$k$p$nMPID_サザ|Micaiah...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|There will always be a final farewell.
Why should we let the future be the
enemy of the present?$k$pWe owe it to ourselves to make some
happy memories now, so that we
might cherish them later.$k$pThat's all we can do.$k$p$nMPID_サザ|You're right. We should make the
most of our time together.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ミカヤ|Dance with me, then. I want to hold
on to you as long as I can.$k$p
